long_description: The Trigger Point Performance Quadballer massager helps you massage your quadriceps, illiotibial bands (IT bands), lower back, hamstrings and neck to keep your body performing at its best. Quadballer massager is designed to feel similar to the human hand for effective massage. Place the Quadballer on the floor and roll yourself onto it to massage quadriceps, IT bands and hamstrings. Trigger Point Performance Quadballer massager fits easily in a backpack for convenient transportation.
short_description: The Trigger Point Performance Quadballer massager helps you massage your quadriceps, illiotibial bands (IT bands), lower back, hamstrings and neck to keep your body performing at its best.
